name: DeFi
description: Projects focused on decentralized finance or open finance

subcategories.name: Currencies
subcategories.description: Apps and protocols that issue a cryptocurrency, including stablecoins, ERC20s and non-fungible tokens

subcategories.name: Derivatives
subcategories.description: Derivative issuance and trading platforms

subcategories.name: Exchanges
subcategories.description: Apps and protocols for exchanging and trading cryptocurrencies and tokens, including decentralized and centralized exchanges and liquidity networks

subcategories.name: Insurance
subcategories.description: Insurance services providers

subcategories.name: Investing
subcategories.description: Investment funds, venture capital funds and asset management apps

subcategories.name: Lending
subcategories.description: Apps and protocols for lending cryptocurrencies and tokenized assets and tokenizing collateral

subcategories.name: Payments
subcategories.description: Payment providers supporting cryptocurrencies and tokenized assets, including on-ramps, payment and settlement solutions

subcategories.name: Ratings
subcategories.description: Financial ratings or credit score providers

subcategories.name: Research
subcategories.description: Projects focused on providing data and research about DeFi

subcategories.name: Staking
subcategories.description: Projects focused on providing staking services, such as staking research, delegated staking or node operations

subcategories.name: Wallets
subcategories.description: Wallet apps that support cryptocurrencies and tokenized assets and can provide other DeFi services

name: Education
description: Any project focused on education and learning primary objectives, including institutional academia, technical skills learning, Web3 resources and more

name: Energy
description: Projects focused on the energy and oil sectors

name: Entertainment
description: Projects for entertainment purposes, including music, video, art, books, sports and gaming

subcategories.name: Adult
subcategories.description: Projects focused on providing adult entertainment

subcategories.name: Art
subcategories.description: Projects focused art creation, exchange and hosting

subcategories.name: Collectibles
subcategories.description: Projects for collectibles issuance, exchange and hosting

subcategories.name: Gaming
subcategories.description: Gaming studios, applications or protocols with a primary focus on gaming, gamification and gambling

subcategories.name: Music
subcategories.description: apps and protocols for music streaming and recording

subcategories.name: Blogs
subcategories.description: Projects focused on writing and hosting blogs

subcategories.name: Books
subcategories.description: Projects focused on writing and publishing books and formalized content

subcategories.name: Sports
subcategories.description: Sporting applications and tools

subcategories.name: Video
subcategories.description: Apps and protocols for video streaming and recording

subcategories.name: Virtual Reality
subcategories.description: The use of computer technology to create the effect of an interactive three-dimensional world in which the objects have a sense of spatial presence.

name: Environment
description: The natural world, as a whole or in a particular geographical area, especially as affected by human activity.

name: Events
description: Projects focused on supporting events, including ticketing, sponsorships or event planning

name: Funds
description: Investment and hedge funds, venture capital funds or private equity organizations focused on Web3

name: Grants Organizations
description: Organizations distributing grant funding to other projects

name: Governance
description: Organizations focused on decentralized governance implementations and research, such as DAOs, voting tools and consensus mechanisms

subcategories.name: DAOs
subcategories.description: Decentralized autonomous organizations and projects focused on building frameworks and tooling for decentralized organizations

subcategories.name: Research
subcategories.description: Organizations focused on researching decentralized consensus mechanisms, such as Proof-of-Work or Proof-of-Stake

subcategories.name: Voting
subcategories.description: Decentralized voting and signalling tools for app and protocol governance

name: Hardware
description: Projects focused on developing hardware for Web3 apps and protocols

name: Health & Wellness
description: Projects focused on health care, wellness and medicine

name: Identity
description: Projects focused on identity, reputation and user authentication solutions

name: Lifestyle
description: Projects providing lifestyle services or selling lifestyle goods

name: Manufacturing
description: Projects focused on manufacturing and production services

name: Marketplaces
description: Projects focused on providing venues of exchange for specific goods and services

name: News & Media
description: Projects and outlets focused on providing news and media services

name: Philanthropy
description: Non-profit, Not-for-Profit and Charity organizations

name: Places
description: Apps and protocols focused on location services, like geographic positioning

name: Research
description: Projects focused on Web3 development, including cryptoeconomics, distributed systems, consensus mechanisms, scalability and more

name: Services
description: Apps and protocols providing professional services

subcategories.name: Accounting
subcategories.description: Accounting services focused on cryptocurrency and tokenized assetsR

subcategories.name: Human Resources
subcategories.description: HR and professional services, including hiring, recruiting, people management and development

subcategories.name: Legal
subcategories.description: Legal Services focused on cryptocurrency and blockchain, including regulation, securities laws, LAOs

subcategories.name: Marketing & PR
subcategories.description: Marketing, PR and Media companies focused on promoting cryptocurrency and blockchain

subcategories.name: Software Development
subcategories.description: Developer shops and projects focused on software creation as a service

name: Social Networks
description: Projects providing social networking platforms and tools

name: Software
description: Projects focused on building software for developing Web3, including blockchains, cryptoeconomic systems and tokenized assets

subcategories.name: Analytics
subcategories.description: Projects focused on consuming and analyzing data from Web3 apps and protocols, including block explorers, analytics apps, data feeds

subcategories.name: Blockchain Development
subcategories.description: Projects and teams focused on researching and building blockchains, distributed systems and sidechains

subcategories.name: Computation
subcategories.description: Projects focused on computation for Web3 protocols, such as researching computation, implementing computation sharing solutions

subcategories.name: Custody
subcategories.description: Projects focused on providing custody or delegate services, such as custody of user funds and private keys

subcategories.name: Developer Tools
subcategories.description: Projects focused on researching and building developer tooling for Web3 apps and protocols

subcategories.name: Libraries
subcategories.description: Projects focused on building libraries for Web3 development

subcategories.name: Networking
subcategories.description: Projects focused on networking between Web3 protocols, such as p2p networking

subcategories.name: Oracles
subcategories.description: Projects researching or building oracle solutions for Web3 apps and protocols, including oracles for on-chain and off-chain data

subcategories.name: Privacy
subcategories.description: projects researching or building privacy solutions for Web3 apps and protocols, such as cryptography research, mixers

subcategories.name: Scaling
subcategories.description: Projects researching or building blockchain scaling solutions, including layer 1 (mainnet) and layer 2 scalability

subcategories.name: Security & Audits
subcategories.description: Projects focused on providing software or hardware security, including code security, audits and testing and general security practices

subcategories.name: Storage
subcategories.description: Projects focused on storage for Web3 protocols, including file sharing, cloud storage and more

name: Supply Chain
description: Apps and protocols focused on supply chain management, tracking and optimization

name: Work
description: Projects focused on gig economies, future of work and professional reputation
